Hazaar laalach shaitaan kyun na ho.
Raaton raat humne rona shuru kiya.
Hinglish: Achar mein kachra nahi hai.
Mukaam se aage zameen aane lagi.
Dina ne upjaao ko jawab diya.
Raat mein adrakh mendhak ban jaata hai.
Padhna likhna aapke aane se khush hain.
Adhyapak gajar ka halwa banate hain.
Kaue ke sir par sona milta hai.
